sentence.Network_en: I cut it out and pinned it to my studio wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把它剪下来钉在我工作室的墙上。

sentence.Network_en: He had pinned up a map of Finland.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把一张芬兰地图钉在了墙上。

sentence.Network_en: She pinned the poppy to his raincoat.
sentence.Network_cn: 她把罂粟花别在了他的雨衣上。

PerfectNetExp.abs: he pinned great hopes on us ., 他对我们寄托了很大希望.
our eyes were literally pinned to TV during the Gulf war ., 海湾战争期间我们的眼睛简直像是钉在了电视屏幕上.
where that woman tripped you and pinned you to the floor ., 那个女人把你绊倒压在地上.
a note pinned to the document ., 别在文件上的便条.
